statements: SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions;
SELECT vehicle_type, emission_level FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_level > 50;
SELECT id, vehicle_type FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM carbon_emissions WHERE vehicle_type LIKE '%car%';
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions ORDER BY emission_level DESC, emission_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions ORDER BY emission_level DESC, emission_date ASC;
SELECT id, vehicle_type FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_level > 50 ORDER BY emission_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_type, emission_level FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY vehicle_type ASC;
SELECT MIN(emission_level), MAX(emission_level) FROM carbon_emissions WHERE vehicle_type LIKE '%electric%';
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_records, AVG(emission_level) AS avg_emission FROM carbon_emissions WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT * FROM transportation
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type FROM transportation WHERE emission_level > 0
SELECT sender_name, receiver_name FROM shipping ORDER BY package_id DESC
SELECT * FROM transportation WHERE emission_level < 0.5 ORDER BY vehicle_id
SELECT package_id, emissions_generated FROM shipping WHERE sender_name = 'Alice'
SELECT * FROM transportation WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car' ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type FROM transportation WHERE emission_level > 5 ORDER BY vehicle_id ASC;
SELECT sender_name, receiver_name, emissions_generated FROM shipping WHERE receiver_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY package_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation WHERE emission_level BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY vehicle_type ASC;
SELECT package_id, sender_name, receiver_name, emissions_generated FROM shipping WHERE emissions_generated < 10 ORDER BY receiver_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM emissions_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, vehicle_type FROM emissions_data WHERE distance_km > 1000;
SELECT id, carbon_emissions_kg FROM emissions_data WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV' AND carbon_emissions_kg < 50;
SELECT * FROM shipping_data WHERE origin = 'New York' AND destination = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT id, distance_km, carbon_emissions_kg FROM emissions_data WHERE carbon_emissions_kg > 100 ORDER BY distance_km ASC;
SELECT * FROM emissions_data ORDER BY date DESC, distance_km ASC
SELECT id, vehicle_type, carbon_emissions_kg FROM emissions_data WHERE carbon_emissions_kg > 100 ORDER BY carbon_emissions_kg DESC
SELECT date, distance_km FROM emissions_data WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV' AND carbon_emissions_kg < 200 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT id, origin, destination FROM shipping_data WHERE distance_km > 500 AND carbon_emissions_kg < 100 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM vehicle_types
SELECT * FROM transportation;
SELECT company_name, emissions FROM shipping WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT id, start_location, end_location FROM route ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT company_name, country, total_emissions FROM shipping INNER JOIN emissions_report ON shipping.id = emissions_report.shipping_id;
SELECT vehicle_type, emissions FROM transportation WHERE emissions > 50 ORDER BY emissions ASC;
SELECT * FROM transportation ORDER BY vehicle_type DESC, emissions ASC;
SELECT company_name, country, emissions FROM shipping WHERE country = 'USA';

SELECT transportation.vehicle_type, shipping.company_name, total_emissions FROM emissions_report JOIN transportation ON emissions_report.transportation_id = transportation.id JOIN shipping ON emissions_report.shipping_id = shipping.id;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance FROM route WHERE distance > 500 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT AVG(total_emissions) AS average_emissions FROM emissions_report GROUP BY shipping_id;
SELECT * FROM transportation ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT vehicle_type, emissions FROM transportation WHERE emissions > 50;
SELECT city, country FROM location WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT package_id, distance FROM shipping WHERE distance < 100;
SELECT project_name, total_offset FROM carbon_offsets ORDER BY total_offset ASC;
SELECT * FROM transportation WHERE emissions > 10 ORDER BY vehicle_type DESC
SELECT package_id, distance, weight FROM shipping WHERE distance < 100 AND weight > 5
SELECT city, country FROM location WHERE latitude < 0 ORDER BY city
SELECT project_name, total_offset FROM carbon_offsets ORDER BY total_offset DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT date, amount_of_emissions FROM emissions_reporting WHERE amount_of_emissions > 50 ORDER BY date
